lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I want to help you help your community.

lenders.name: Maria and Andrew

lenders.occupational_info: We are graduate students, I study Public Health and my husband studies Social Work.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It would be nice to see an end to hunger and poverty in my lifetime. Just like the woman in another country, our desires are very similar -- to seek a better life for ourselves and our families. Part of the registration fees for small events I hold in my community go to fund female entrepreneurs worldwide. It's great to see women helping women across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I support women entrepreneurs who seek to live out a passionate living by running a program called Ladies Who Launch in Santa Barbara, CA. My days really vary. I could be leading workshops in the evenings and running my online store during the day. Right now I'm working on launching an e-commerce solution that will help online stores automate their shipping and fulfillment process to save them time, money, and headaches.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: my friend, Jackie, sent me a gift certificate for my birthday. Sharing our resources is the right thing to do when you cannot even think of one gift that would be just as appreciated by any one of your friends or family members...
lenders.occupational_info: It's my job to motivate children to become life-long learners and reach for the stars...and I can't think of any better way to utilize my time and talents.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: It is so wonderful to help other people in need.  Together, we can change the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling that giving provides.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help others and feel this is a great way to do it.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do.

lenders.name: ELISE
lenders.loan_because: "There, but for fortune, go you or I."

lenders.name: lori
lenders.loan_because:
i care 
i can

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: While I don't have a whole lot of money, I have some. I also know what its like to be a single mother with children, trying to make a living. I give to a charity here, but I don't know where it goes. So, I think that by giving to KIVA,  while I still don't know where it will go, I at least hope it will be where it will help someone, and not pay for a charity's overhead.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a semi truck and trailer, which  together have 18 wheels.  I deliver the sports equipment my company makes to their three warehouses, which are in my town.  I have driven for construction companies, going out of town to work, but I like this much better.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: As someone with enough in my pocket, enough to eat, and more than enough luxuries, I feel it is my duty to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a lot of fun writing software.

lenders.occupational_info: I offer an economic alternative to centralized energy generation by way of distributed solar electric power.

lenders.name: Ned
lenders.loan_because: It provides opportunity to enterprising folks
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people invest to finance their dreams

lenders.name: Colleen

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick people.

lenders.name: Jim

It makes me feel good to be able to lend a hand and, maybe let others know that there are Americans who aren't out to exploit everyone for their own gains.
lenders.occupational_info: I own my own business, along with my wife who is my partner. Our business is providing insurance and investment products and services to the public, as well as providing these same items to independent agents on a wholesale basis.

lenders.name: Siobhan

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student attending the University of Connecticut.

lenders.occupational_info: I repair and remodel houses, build top-bar beehives and do other odd projects as they come up. My wife and I also keep a few bee hives.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy to make a difference in the world!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying International Relations at the University of Toronto.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world." --Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I love working at the company my dad started in 1968 - Amigo Mobility. We manufacture mobility products for people with walking disabilities.

lenders.name: Lowell
lenders.loan_because: it means something.
lenders.occupational_info: I run The Metaverse Journal, a virtual worlds news site and use a proportion of its revenue for Kiva.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able.
lenders.occupational_info: Doctor specializing in heart disease

lenders.name: Jennifer and Matt
lenders.loan_because: We can!

lenders.name: Hannelore
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro finance is the most effective way to make this world better, one person at a time.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I really have a genuine need to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time college student going to school to be an Art Teacher.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to bootstrap a business and how no-one will loan you money, well at least banks.  I also believe these small loans and the pooling effect kiva provides goes much further in these developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell used medical and lab equipment.  I buy it from one facility and turn around and sell to another.  I started with virtually no money and just rolled my profits into more inventory.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I'm a loaner! :)  Live Aloha!

lenders.name: Jane M
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And I'm grateful to have an opportunity to help a few others.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach people in how to do things better in their business or organisation.  For example, put in better systems, have better procedures.

lenders.name: The McKenzie Family
lenders.loan_because: It is awesome to see the repayments made so quickly and then we are able to loan the same money again and again.
lenders.occupational_info: In public health, we work to improve and protect the health of our community by ensuring clean water, healthy food, preventing disease outbreaks, and educating the community about good health choices for a long and healthy life.

lenders.name: B.E.M.
lenders.loan_because: Wind blows, rain falls, and we all live on the same spinning ball, together.

lenders.name: Evette
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to be a blessing.

lenders.name: Forrest

I want to give hope.  My motivation comes from my Maker.  I loan as an act of love.

lenders.occupational_info: Student of Finance at Texas A&M University

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful to have something to offer.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist, and I teach students how to take photographs.

lenders.loan_because: I have enough and others do not.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I develop digital content for all venues.

lenders.name: emily
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed

lenders.occupational_info: Children, Spanish, Teaching, Translating....etc

lenders.loan_because: Loki says so.

lenders.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to.

I am a retired and active senior citizen interested in other lands and people.


FROM HER FAMILY: Frances, our Mom and best friend, passed away on January 9, 2009. Our most sincere thanks to those of you who contributed -in memoriam- to keep her KIVA project ongoing.  She truly believed that helping people one-to-one was the most rewarding thing one could do in life.  

Plant a bean... get a bean.
